item.title: My experience – Jim Holmes
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Every couple weeks, starting today and ending right around the time of the conference, I’m going to post short videos or text blurbs from previous #kalx speakers. The first comes from friend and mentor, Jim Holmes. Jim has always been … Continued
item.content:encoded:
Every couple weeks, starting today and ending right around the time of the conference, I’m going to post short videos or text blurbs from previous #kalx speakers.

The first comes from friend and mentor, Jim Holmes. Jim has always been a big supporter of the conference (and me), and has spoken at the event 6 of the 10 years! When I first mentioned the idea of asking previous speakers to record videos or write something up, without hesitation Jim said “yes” and within a day or two sent me the following video.
